channel.title: Fix spawn again. -.-
channel.description:
Some noob thinks it's fun to destory blocks by spawn. And they fucked up the whole thing. -.- Now I get the message if I don't do /login in time 'Flying is not enabled on the server' then kicks me. I don't have a fly mod. -.-
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/osd55i.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/vrq2if.png[/img]
Theres the message I get, if I don't do '/login' fast enough. Which is like 10 seconds. I can type my password that fast, but I find it pointless in trying to type AS FAST AS I CAN, to not get the 'Flying is not enabled on the server'
So please fix spawn again. :) At least it's not the portal. :D
Btw, the coords to the spot is..... X:-57 Z:142
That or just fill it all in, or just give me build permissions, so I can fix it everytime some destories something. :3
Please and thank you. :D
butteredjames FORMALLY shadowlurking since I lost access to that account. :/

item.title: Fix spawn again. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:10, topic:419175”][quote author=omgilikepie link=topic=521704.msg3792132#msg3792132 date=1319375429]
Possibly make spawn out of bedrock? Since you can’t break it. May look a little weird, but if nothing else it might solve this problem.
[/quote]
Well the problem we have is the griefing that makes spawn look shit. Making it out of bedrock will just make it permanently shit.

Giving us +build should be fine to fix little griefs, and we can always report more drastic stuff. And it lets us fix shit that endermen break, which we can’t really report.

GIVE US +BUILD OMG

oh also, we probably need more explicit rules on using mods. Obviously flying and xraying is against the rules, but anything that gives us an “unfair advantage” is a bit ambiguous. Surely any mod is going to give you an advantage over other players?[/quote]

xray and flying are the main one. There is nothing against sneaking, and I have mine so I can sneak up on you all like creepers! >:D And go SSSSSSSSS BOOM! XD

Read full topic

item.title: Fix spawn again. -.-
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

omgilikepie:

Possibly make spawn out of bedrock? Since you can’t break it. May look a little weird, but if nothing else it might solve this problem.

Well the problem we have is the griefing that makes spawn look shit. Making it out of bedrock will just make it permanently shit.

Giving us +build should be fine to fix little griefs, and we can always report more drastic stuff. And it lets us fix shit that endermen break, which we can’t really report.

GIVE US +BUILD OMG

oh also, we probably need more explicit rules on using mods. Obviously flying and xraying is against the rules, but anything that gives us an “unfair advantage” is a bit ambiguous. Surely any mod is going to give you an advantage over other players?

Read full topic

item.title: Fix spawn again. -.-
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:7, topic:419175”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=521704.msg3791961#msg3791961 date=1319359177]

I don’t see why we can’t build there, it’s not like people can do more damage by building than breaking.

I agree. Why can’t you make is so you can’t destroy either.

What is ‘sneak’?

Isn’t it when you hold shift and you walk to the edge of a block so you can build next to it without falling?

^^^^ What he said. I have it so it’ll tell me if i’m crouching. PLUS theres not rule against sneak, so I use it. So I can crouch and not fall off of things. xD But it’s mainly so I don’t fall off of things. So yeah.

Sneaking is enabled in the client by default.
[/quote]

It tells him if he’s crouching. And maybe it locks too? Either way, no form of crouching is against the rules.[/quote]True. It just makes me suspicious when I see people that have mods, that’s all

Read full topic

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:419175”][quote author=Demon6994 link=topic=521704.msg3791673#msg3791673 date=1319333775]

I don’t see why we can’t build there, it’s not like people can do more damage by building than breaking.

I agree. Why can’t you make is so you can’t destroy either.

What is ‘sneak’?

Isn’t it when you hold shift and you walk to the edge of a block so you can build next to it without falling?

^^^^ What he said. I have it so it’ll tell me if i’m crouching. PLUS theres not rule against sneak, so I use it. So I can crouch and not fall off of things. xD But it’s mainly so I don’t fall off of things. So yeah.
[/quote]

Sneaking is enabled in the client by default.[/quote]

It tells him if he’s crouching. And maybe it locks too? Either way, no form of crouching is against the rules.
